definition: would rather.../it would be better.../would prefer
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
to agree/to consent/to be ready (to do sth)/willing

sentences.english: Is it not stange that most of us choose sucking rather than running?
sentences.chinese: 但我们大多宁肯吮吸却不愿奔流向前，这不奇怪吗？

sentences.english: We would rather cut down the price than keep a large quantity of goods in stock.
sentences.chinese: 我们宁肯降低价格，也不愿积压大量货物。

sentences.english: I would rather fail than tricking in the examination.
sentences.chinese: 我宁肯考试通不过也不愿作弊。

sentences.english: Better an abandoned purse than an empty arch.
sentences.chinese: 宁肯钱袋瘪，不要脑袋空。

sentences.english: Rather than borrow, he went without food.
sentences.chinese: 他宁肯不吃，也不愿借债。

sentences.english: She would have preferred the humble cart.
sentences.chinese: 她似乎宁肯坐那辆简陋寒酸的马车。

sentences.english: You know I would rather visit the dentist than study algebra and arithmetic!
sentences.chinese: 你知道我宁肯去看牙医也不愿意学习代数和算术。

sentences.english: "I decided it was better for me to break that promise than to endorse the lie, " he says.
sentences.chinese: “我认为宁肯我食言也不能纵容撒谎，”他说。

sentences.english: To accept exposure as a criminal for fear of being exposed as an illiterate?
sentences.chinese: 宁肯做个罪犯而害怕暴露出自己的无知吗？

sentences.english: The Tan Song prefer to have inherited a wreck and Tracy married.
sentences.chinese: 而傩送宁肯继承一条破船也要与翠翠成婚。

sentences.english: Some young people in the west fear marriage and would rather cohabitate.
sentences.chinese: 西方社会的一些年青人怕结婚，他们宁肯同居。

sentences.english: eg. We would rather cut down the price than keep a large quantity of goods in stock.
sentences.chinese: 我们宁肯降低价格，也不愿积压大量货物。

sentences.english: Do you prefer an ugly but considerate wife or a beautiful but self-centered one?
sentences.chinese: 你宁肯娶一般贴的丑妻照旧一个无私的美妻？

sentences.english: Misers put their back and belly into their pocket.
sentences.chinese: 守财奴宁肯挨冻受饿也舍不得花钱。

sentences.english: As father, faithful establish would rather loses the job to also want to look for a daughter.
sentences.chinese: 作为父亲，忠植宁肯失去工作也要找回女儿。

sentences.english: Misers put their back and belly into their pockets.
sentences.chinese: 守财奴宁肯挨饿受冻也舍不得花钱。

definition: preferably/one would prefer to...(or not to...)/would rather/(would) be better to/(to pick) the lesser of two evils
willingness/would rather (agree to X than Y)
to agree/to consent/to be ready (to do sth)/willing
to be willing to/to resign oneself to
not stint/not spare/not hesitate (to do sth)/not scruple (to do sth)
to have no alternative (idiom); compelled by circumstances/forced into sth
to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
delighted to (do sth, idiom)/perfectly happy to do/most willing to do
